sentences.en: a bowdlerized version of ‘Antony and Cleopatra’
sentences.cn: 《安东尼和克里奥帕特拉》的删节本

sentences.en: If you bowdlerize Story of the Wing , it wouldn't be as interesting a book.
sentences.cn: 如果删除《西厢记》里的不雅文字, 读起来就没那麽有趣了.

trans.tran_cn: 删除(书等的)不妥的文句, 删改, 修订
trans.tran_en: to remove all the parts of a book, play etc that you think might offend someone – used to show disapproval

trans.tran_cn: 删除（书刊、剧本等中）有伤风化的词语或场面
trans.tran_en: to remove all the parts of a book, play etc that you think might offend someone – used to show disapproval
